01 Jun 2017

#TeamDiablo

Diablo themed signs for my team at work

My current team’s name at work is Diablo. To pretty up the workspace I created a cubicle signs for each of our members. Each completed sign consists of about 5 hours of print time! Each sign consists of mutliple parts to make painting and assebmly easy. No supports or sanding required. I have uploaded the parts to Thingiverse in case you’d like to make one of your own.

Printers Used

  • Anet A8
  • Creality CR-10
  • Folgertech FT5
